title: Scribble Elements 02
longDescription:
Enjoy the dynamic and action animation template, which includes a unique collection of Scribble Elements! 

This package contains 12 Scribble Elements sprite sheet animations for 2D Games.

         

Features:

● Sprite animations work much better than any other shaders and particles due to

memory capacity.

● Optimized for games.

● Pivot point set properly.

● No setup or plug-ins required.

● All materials, sprites and other parts of pack properly named.
technicalDetails:
Video:

https://youtu.be/FvMqsjbsIWA


Technical details:

● File Formats: transparent Png.

● Each frame dimension is 512*288 px.

● 30FPS


Texture Resolutions:


● Scribble Element 01_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 02_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 03_1536 × 1152

● Scribble Element 04_1536 × 1440

● Scribble Element 05_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 06_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 07_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 08_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 09_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 10_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 11_2048 × 1440

● Scribble Element 12_3072 × 1728


Number of Textures: 12

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
